code: import'./App.css';import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[file,setFile]=useState("");const[flashCards,setFlashCards]=useState("");const sendFile=async()=>{const formData=new FormData();formData.append('file',file);const response=await fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000",{method:"POST",body:formData});const json=await response.json();console.log(json);setFlashCards(json);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"header",children:"PerfectStudy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"header center",children:"Drop in a PDF to generate flashcards."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",onChange:e=>setFile(e.target.files[0])}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{form:"post",onClick:sendFile,children:"Enter"})]});}export default App;
